sentences.english: SH is supposed to go to severe winter training very soon.
sentences.chinese: 承憲應該很快就要去接受嚴酷的冬訓了。

sentences.english: Therefore many officials were killed in his ruling period.
sentences.chinese: 他統治時期法律嚴酷，造成了人人自危的恐怖統治。

sentences.english: Those variants equip an organism specially well to cope with the exigencies of the environments.
sentences.chinese: 變異使生物體配備得特別完善以應付環境的嚴酷要求。

sentences.english: She is awaking to the grim realities of life.
sentences.chinese: 她開始意識到生活中的種種嚴酷現實。

sentences.english: The tide had already turned against Valorum in the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 在議會，嚴酷的形勢已經變得對瓦洛倫極爲不利。

sentences.english: Facies of species are often connected with extreme or disturbed habitats .
sentences.chinese: 植物種的羣常與嚴酷或干擾的生境有聯繫。

sentences.english: The severe weather also affected the shipment of fresh vegetables throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 嚴酷天氣還影響了全國各地的新鮮蔬菜運輸。

sentences.english: The cruel revenge of a woman is to remain faithful to a man.
sentences.chinese: 女子最嚴酷的復仇方式，是對一個男人一直保持貞忠。

sentences.english: Severe Winter Training started from today for a week.
sentences.chinese: 嚴酷的冬訓從今天開始，持續一週。

sentences.english: As the climate is so inclement few people live in this region.
sentences.chinese: 由於氣候嚴酷，所以很少人居住在這個地區。

sentences.english: Fache's eyes hardened. "You think Saunière is calling the Church a lame saint and a Draconian devil?"
sentences.chinese: 你是說索尼埃把教會稱作瘸腿的聖徒和嚴酷的魔王？

sentences.english: The harshness of recent reality disentranced him from his idleness.
sentences.chinese: 最近的嚴酷現實使他醒悟，不再遊手好閒了。

sentences.english: At the end of a grim and brutal month, Rosie learned to read.
sentences.chinese: 這樣嚴酷無情的訓練進行到了月底，蘿茜學會了閱讀。

sentences.english: I point you to Arachaea, aka Archaebacteria and Extremophiles. These miraculous organisms live in ridiculously extreme climates.
sentences.chinese: 這些奇蹟般的微生物能在極其嚴酷的氣候條件下生活。

sentences.english: However, few people question the necessity of these aggressive forms of treatment.
sentences.chinese: 但是幾乎沒人質疑這些嚴酷的治療形式的必要性。

sentences.english: An admirable people wrests a living from the reluctant soil and the merciless seas.
sentences.chinese: 可敬可佩的人們從貧瘠的土地和嚴酷的大海謀求生計。

definition: lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
you can't guard against it (idiom)/impossible to defend effectively/not much one can do about it/It can't be prevented.
tossed about by the wind and rain (idiom)/(of a situation) unstable
lit. severe floods and fierce beasts (idiom)/fig. great scourges/extremely dangerous or threatening things
to judge the hour and size up the situation/to take stock
unheard of/an extremely rare and unprecedented event
